entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Whitby
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:51 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 7.

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 late this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
